subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Baffert has had three horses come within a victory of a Triple Crown sweep, but this year he said his only desire was to win the Kentucky Derby.
snippet: Baffert has had three horses come within a victory of a Triple Crown sweep, but this year he said his only desire was to win the Kentucky Derby.
